name: Battlin' Boxer Comet Ultra Panzer Blastshot
text:
2+ Level 4 monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card or another Battlin' Boxer Xyz monster, target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.
This card gains effects based on the number of Xyz materials it has.
2+ This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.
3+ This card gains 500 ATK for each material attached to it. 
4+ This card can attack monsters twice per turn, and the first time it battles an opponent's monster this turn, the monster is not destroyed.
